scripts.ios: vite build && cd cordova_app && cordova run ios --device
scripts.ios-debug: vite build && cd cordova_app && cordova run ios --device --debug
scripts.browser: vite build && cd cordova_app && cordova run browser --port=8200
scripts.android-build: vite build && cd cordova_app && cordova build android --release
scripts.android-device: vite build && cd cordova_app && cordova run android --device
scripts.android: vite build && cd cordova_app && cordova run android
